name: THRUST VECTOR
description:
A cross between real-time and turn-based mechanics, in SPACE.

Created for Ludum Dare 41 in 72 hours.

Team:

  • Commie / @xerodev
  • Pogo / @RoloPogo

Instructions:

  • Use WASD keys to move the camera
  • In the lower right box, select which thrusters to actuate
  • Press Space when ready to move the game forward a turn
  • Survive 30 turns!
